Author: attenuatingpixie333
Text: I'm sorry about the death of your planned meal, but omg this sounds amazing. I have so much oatmeal on hand but have been turned off of it for a long time and this sounds like a great way to get back into it because I'm a slut for pumpkin.

Author: sneeakyraccoon
Text: Honestly though, adding half a can of pumpkin to half a cup of oats (cooked with lots of water) is a GREAT volume meal, with good fiber. Add some pumpkin spice seasoning and brown sugar/stevia, youâ€™ve got a tasty, *actually* filling meal. Would recommend without half a bottle of pumpkin spice seasoning :)
